DataElement.preferredName: Microsatellite Instability Identifier Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes no indicator related to a patient's tumor having mismatch repair deficiency

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Genomic instability associated with defective DNA mismatch repair in tumors.

Concepts.definition: Genomic instability associated with the presence of hypermutability in specific genetic marker regions resulting from defective DNA mismatch repair.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is the tumor determined to be
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the tumor determined to be mismatch-repair deficient (dMMR) by CLIA-certified immunohistochemical (IHC) assay with a panel of all four IHC markers, including MLH1, MSH2, PMS2, and MSH6?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the tumor determined to be mismatch-repair deficient (dMMR)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the tumor documented as microsatellite stable or does it have intact mismatch repair proteins through CLIA-approved laboratory testing?
